column5: What's the current approximate U.S. cost on case(24) of beer up in Canada? Need pricing on both bottles and cans. I believe most beer up there is same price regardless of brand,correct? Deposit? LCBO in Vermillion Bay area.

Well, prices can very by type......but, on average with the exchange rate you can expect to pay around $22/case US. You can buy a case of canadian beer at the duty free store at the border for $15 US.
Also, check this BEER STORE website.....you can check the priceof any beer they carry either by cans or bottles.http://www.thebeerstore.ca/storesand...randsearch.asp
